# Map of Tactics, Greater (WondArch)
## Overview
**Map of Tactics, Greater:** This item works like the *[[Map of Tactics (WondArch)|map of tactics]]*, except that it can track up to six subjects at a time and for up to 18 hours each.

*Caster Level:* 18th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Status (Spell)|status]]**; Market Price:* 36,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 80
